extendedInfo.description: A beautiful live wallpaper showing colorful meadow in the summer. Observe fireflies and bubbles over the swaying grass. Watch how times of the day change dynamically from dawn to night and how droplings fall and slide on the grass blades. You can also touch the fireflies to make them run away or pop a bubble of your desire. This wallpaper uses OpenGL for rendering with full support for landscape and home screen switching. It supports all resolutions.You can configure a lot of settings for the duration of a time of the day, fireflies' reaction to touch, popping bubbles and their number and much more.Note: for the first run you have to be connected to internet for license validation.Permissions: Coarse location is needed for sunrise/sunset times calculation.

reviews.title: Fireflies
reviews.comment: Great quality. I really like this fireflies, I wish there were more or the option to choose the number of fireflies. Firefly colour choice for silver vs golden would be nice too. The bubbles are a bit weird but it feels like it\'s missing something if there aren\'t a few bubbles. Maybe more fireflies would make up for that.
reviews.author: Jackie Ebert

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love the motion and the colors and the fireflies. It\'s everything I look for in a wallpaper!
reviews.author: Lisa Campbell

reviews.title: High def live wallpaper
reviews.comment: This is a great live wallpaper but you need to fix the time of day so it changes accordingly reeal time ibstead of every five minutes or so
reviews.author: Muntasir Al Jahdhami

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: * Update caused the LWP to crash.. My out-of-date version is working properly but the updated one doesn\'t even load..  Pls fix...  Thank you for the update!!!  All my devices are running this LWP and it is GORGEOUS!  Simply put, one of the best LWP\'s on the market. Worth buying.
reviews.author: Luis Mayer Jr

reviews.title: Good and nice looking...
reviews.comment: Need more interactivity, like grass touch and gyro movement... Maybe real-time weather or time of the day... Please add second theme with sky in background, with sun/moon, clouds, etc., and change boring licence checking...
reviews.author: Dejan Milenkovi\304\207

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: It says you can choose you favorite, but it only actially lets me do dawn or night. That\'s frustrating because I like the evening. Also I do agree it should be on real time. That would be awesome. Fix those and five stars for you.
reviews.author: Shannon walker

reviews.title: Good..but?
reviews.comment: Best live wallpaper..but its really makes battery drain fast and phone getting warmer.. My device Xperia Z Hope you will fix this..
reviews.author: syahril wijaya

reviews.title: Best!
reviews.comment: Worth every penny! Really nice , goodnjob!
reviews.author: Mick Jhon

reviews.title: Time of day
reviews.comment: Very nice but I wish i could use actual time of day not a max of 5 minutes per section of the day!
reviews.author: Patrick Miller

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: You\'re very beautiful and a life
